sentences.en: Always ever thought the summation of any ability should thinking ability.
sentences.cn: 曾总认为任何能力的总和应该的思维能力.

sentences.en: Her introduction is a model of fairness, a lively summation of Irish history.
sentences.cn: 她的导论是客观公正的典范，是对爱尔兰历史的生动概括。

sentences.en: His summation was a great piece of courtroom theater ( Ron Rosenbaum )
sentences.cn: 他的总结是个很好的法庭戏剧材料 ( 罗恩罗森鲍姆 )

sentences.en: It is convenient to introduce here the summation operator.
sentences.cn: 应当在此介绍一下求和的算符.

sentences.en: It is distillation and summation of working experience too.
sentences.cn: 也是对工作经验的总结和升华.

sentences.en: Monthly precipitation is the summation of daily precipitation of a month.
sentences.cn: 月降水量是将全月各日的降水量累加而得.

sentences.en: Since a dummy index just indicates summation, it is immaterial which symbol is used.
sentences.cn: 由于哑指标只是表明求和, 所以它使用什么符号是无关重要的.

sentences.en: The electrostatic summation must be evaluated for an explicIt'set of ion position.
sentences.cn: 静电能的加和必须根据离子的具体位置来计算.

sentences.en: The exhibition was a summation of his life's work.
sentences.cn: 这次展览汇集了他一生中典型的作品.

sentences.en: The intergral of the tabulated function can be found by forming a summation series.
sentences.cn: 表列函数的积分可用列出和的系列求出.

sentences.en: The most attractive feature of the urban landscape is brilliant summation.
sentences.cn: 城市景观特色是对城市魅力最精彩的概括.

sentences.en: The summation extends over all the ions in the solution.
sentences.cn: 总和包括溶液中所有的离子.

sentences.en: The summation forms are quite convenient for computation, especially when the interval is kept constant.
sentences.cn: 和式形式是十分有利于计算的, 特别是当间隔保持常值的时候更是如此.

sentences.en: The Summation Series was the origin of Ancient Egyptian harmonic design.
sentences.cn: 和级数是古埃及和声设计的起源.

sentences.en: What he said was a fair summation of the discussion.
sentences.cn: 他这番话对讨论作了恰当的总结。

trans.tran_cn: 总和，加在一起，总结，概括
